oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Kahl, Johannes
van der Burgt, Geert Jan

Bügel, Susanne

oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Food security, food quality and human health
Regulation
Consumer issues
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Better regulatory guidelines, improved testing methods, and additional research into product quality criteria are needed to further develop the European organic food market.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Kahl, Johannes; van der Burgt, Geert Jan; Kusche, Daniel; Bügel, Susanne; Busscher, Nicolaas; Hallmann, Ewelina; Kretzschmar, Ursula; Ploeger, Angelika; Rembialkowska, Ewa and Huber, Machteld (2010) Organic Food Claims in Europe. foodtechnology (03.10), pp. 38-46.
